_comment: Pain/Gain Trading Bot - Complete Configuration File
_instructions: Copy this file to config.json and edit your settings. All parameters are optional - defaults will be used if not specified.

broker._note: IMPORTANT: Set use_demo to false only when you're ready for live trading!

symbols._note: You can trade all 8 symbols or select specific ones. Remove symbols from arrays to disable them.

risk._description: Risk management parameters - CRITICAL FOR SAFETY

_explanations.daily_stop_usd: Maximum loss per day in USD - trading stops when reached
_explanations.daily_target_usd: Daily profit goal in USD - trading stops when reached
_explanations.max_consecutive_orders: Maximum number of consecutive orders per symbol (3 recommended)
_explanations.max_spread_pips: Maximum allowed spread in pips - order rejected if higher

session._description: Trading session hours and timezone settings

_explanations.session_start: When trading starts (19:00 = 7:00 PM Colombia time)
_explanations.session_end: When trading ends (06:00 = 6:00 AM Colombia time, next day)
_explanations.daily_close_time: When D1 candle closes (16:00 = 4:00 PM Colombia time)
_explanations.timezone_offset: Timezone offset from UTC (-5 for Colombia)
_explanations.allow_extended_hours: Allow trading outside session hours (false = disabled)

_explanations.hold_minutes: Minimum minutes to hold each trade (5 recommended)
_explanations.wait_candles: Number of M5 candles to wait after closing before re-entry (1 recommended)
_explanations.d1_wick_threshold: Percentage of D1 wick to fill before stopping (0.5 = 50%)
_explanations.small_body_ratio: Max body size ratio for D1 bias detection (0.3 = 30%)
_explanations.h4_fib_level: Fibonacci retracement level for H4 confirmation (0.5 = 50%)
_explanations.use_m15_for_fib: Use M15 timeframe for Fibonacci swing points (true recommended)
_explanations.snake_fast_ema: Fast EMA period for Snake indicator (8 recommended)
_explanations.snake_slow_ema: Slow EMA period for Snake indicator (21 recommended)
_explanations.shingle_ema: EMA period for Shingle indicator (50 recommended)
_explanations.purple_line_ema: EMA period for Purple Line indicator (34 recommended)
_explanations.news_filter_enabled: Enable/disable news filter (false = disabled for indices)
_explanations.news_buffer_minutes: Minutes to block trading around news events (30 default)

_explanations.commission_per_lot: Commission charged per lot (0.0 if none)
_explanations.export_format: Export format: csv, excel, or both

_explanations.email_smtp_port: SMTP port (587 for TLS, 465 for SSL)
_explanations.log_level: Logging detail level: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR
